channel.title: Re-add occupy immunity to classes that had it before 2.1

item.title: Re-add occupy immunity to classes that had it before 2.1
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
You can contest a Sheriff calling you Unseen, you can contest a Knight calling you Death Immune, you can contest a Butler calling you Occupy Immune …

But you can’t contest a Butler calling you NON-occupy immune. Because he can occupy you 2 more nights, and that can be a fate worse than death.

Removing “You occupied / redirected X” feedback would solve this.

Or making everyone occupy immune for 1 night after each occupy.

Or, make anyone targeting a Butler / Drunk immune to occupies from that specific Butler / Drunk.

Read full topic
item.source: Re-add occupy immunity to classes that had it before 2.1

that case being ‘action resolution go brrrrrr’

although ideally that would be accompanied by not telling offensives if their target is immune
